page.title: 18SHOULD WE CHANGE RHYD Y FRO.
page.content: We asked people of our village if they would like to have Rhyd y fro changed in any way. Almost everyone agreed that they would not like to change the village atmosphere. Most people liked the communitiy spirit and the rural surroundings and were against any further building in the area. The majority of the people thought they would like better amenities but without changing the appearance of Rhyd y fro. The main request was for a decent park for the younger children of the village. There was a very good park at one end of Rhyd y fro but in the past few years it has fallen into disrepair. Suggestions were made that this should be repaired and another park built at the opposite end of the village. Other suggestions were for a youth club and an old people's centre.
